venue.address_2: cross street Center between Chapel and Crown
venue.name: Bentara

item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Bentara Malaysian Restaurant


If you're only a "Maybe", please put a comment in your RSVP.

Come join the NHC at Bentara.

Drinks Specials from 6pm-8pm:
Their regular Happy Hour pricing will be in effect from 6pm-8pm

Appetizers:
- A selection of complimentary assorted appetizers

Visit them on the web at www.bentara.com

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

Contact: Jason, my cell is in my RSVP. Texting is fine too

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You'll probably have no problem spotting the group, but you can always text or call
item.name: Happy Hour at Bentara Malaysian Restaurant
